title: CSS basic user interface
summary: The CSS basic user interface module lets you define the rendering and functionality of features related to the user interface including outline properties, visual feedback to pointing device and keyboard, and altering the default appearance of UI widgets.
pageTitle: CSS basic user interface - CSS: Cascading Style Sheets | MDN
